data.name: ArraySizeMustBeSpecified
data.value: Marshalling an array from unmanaged to managed requires either the 'SizeParamIndex' or 'SizeConst' fields to be set on a 'MarshalAsAttribute'.

data.name: ArraySizeParamIndexOutOfRange
data.value: The 'SizeParamIndex' value in the 'MarshalAsAttribute' is out of range.

data.name: ArraySizeParamTypeMustBeIntegral
data.value: The specified array size parameter for an array must be an integer type.

data.name: BlittableTypeMustBeBlittableDescription
data.value: A type marked with 'BlittableTypeAttribute' must be blittable.

data.name: BlittableTypeMustBeBlittableMessage
data.value: Type '{0}' is marked with 'BlittableTypeAttribute' but is not blittable

data.name: CannotHaveMultipleMarshallingAttributesDescription
data.value: The 'BlittableTypeAttribute' and 'NativeMarshallingAttribute' attributes are mutually exclusive.

data.name: CannotHaveMultipleMarshallingAttributesMessage
data.value: Type '{0}' is marked with 'BlittableTypeAttribute' and 'NativeMarshallingAttribute'. A type can only have one of these two attributes.

data.name: ConfigurationNotSupportedDescription
data.value: Source-generated P/Invokes will ignore any configuration that is not supported.

data.name: ConfigurationNotSupportedMessage
data.value: The '{0}' configuration is not supported by source-generated P/Invokes. If the specified configuration is required, use a regular `DllImport` instead.

data.name: ConfigurationNotSupportedMessageParameter
data.value: The specified '{0}' configuration for parameter '{1}' is not supported by source-generated P/Invokes. If the specified configuration is required, use a regular `DllImport` instead.

data.name: ConfigurationNotSupportedMessageReturn
data.value: The specified '{0}' configuration for the return value of method '{1}' is not supported by source-generated P/Invokes. If the specified configuration is required, use a regular `DllImport` instead.

data.name: ConfigurationNotSupportedMessageValue
data.value: The specified value '{0}' for '{1}' is not supported by source-generated P/Invokes. If the specified configuration is required, use a regular `DllImport` instead.

data.name: ConfigurationNotSupportedTitle
data.value: Specified configuration is not supported by source-generated P/Invokes.

data.name: ConvertToGeneratedDllImportDescription
data.value: Use 'GeneratedDllImportAttribute' instead of 'DllImportAttribute' to generate P/Invoke marshalling code at compile time

data.name: ConvertToGeneratedDllImportMessage
data.value: Mark the method '{0}' with 'GeneratedDllImportAttribute' instead of 'DllImportAttribute' to generate P/Invoke marshalling code at compile time

data.name: ConvertToGeneratedDllImportNoPreprocessor
data.value: Convert to 'GeneratedDllImport'

data.name: ConvertToGeneratedDllImportTitle
data.value: Use 'GeneratedDllImportAttribute' instead of 'DllImportAttribute' to generate P/Invoke marshalling code at compile time

data.name: ConvertToGeneratedDllImportWarning
data.value: Conversion to 'GeneratedDllImport' may change behavior and compatibility. See {0} for more information.

data.name: ConvertToGeneratedDllImportWithPreprocessor
data.value: Convert to 'GeneratedDllImport' under a preprocessor define

data.name: CustomTypeMarshallingManagedToNativeUnsupported
data.value: The specified parameter needs to be marshalled from managed to native, but the native type '{0}' does not support it.

data.name: CustomTypeMarshallingNativeToManagedUnsupported
data.value: The specified parameter needs to be marshalled from native to managed, but the native type '{0}' does not support it.

data.name: GeneratedDllImportMissingModifiersDescription
data.value: Methods marked with 'GeneratedDllImportAttribute' should be 'static' and 'partial'. P/Invoke source generation will ignore methods that are not 'static' and 'partial'.

data.name: GeneratedDllImportMissingModifiersMessage
data.value: Method '{0}' should be 'static' and 'partial' when marked with 'GeneratedDllImportAttribute'. P/Invoke source generation will ignore methods that are not 'static' and 'partial'.

data.name: GeneratedDllImportMissingModifiersTitle
data.value: Method marked with 'GeneratedDllImportAttribute' should be 'static' and 'partial'

data.name: GetPinnableReferenceReturnTypeBlittableDescription
data.value: The return type of 'GetPinnableReference' (after accounting for 'ref') must be blittable.

data.name: GetPinnableReferenceReturnTypeBlittableMessage
data.value: The dereferenced type of the return type of the 'GetPinnableReference' method must be blittable

data.name: GetPinnableReferenceShouldSupportAllocatingMarshallingFallbackDescription
data.value: A type that supports marshalling from managed to native by pinning should also support marshalling from managed to native where pinning is impossible.

data.name: GetPinnableReferenceShouldSupportAllocatingMarshallingFallbackMessage
data.value: Type '{0}' has a 'GetPinnableReference' method but its native type does not support marshalling in scenarios where pinning is impossible

data.name: InAttributeNotSupportedWithoutOut
data.value: The '[In]' attribute is not supported unless the '[Out]' attribute is also used. The behavior of the '[In]' attribute without the '[Out]' attribute is the same as the default behavior.

data.name: InOutAttributeByRefNotSupported
data.value: The '[In]' and '[Out]' attributes are unsupported on parameters passed by reference. Use the 'in', 'ref', or 'out' keywords instead.

data.name: InOutAttributeMarshalerNotSupported
data.value: The provided '[In]' and '[Out]' attributes on this parameter are unsupported on this parameter.

data.name: MarshallingCharAsSpecifiedCharSetNotSupported
data.value: Marshalling char with 'CharSet.{0}' is not supported. Instead, manually convert the char type to the desired byte representation and pass to the source-generated P/Invoke.

data.name: MarshallingStringOrCharAsUndefinedNotSupported
data.value: Marshalling string or char without explicit marshalling information is not supported. Specify either 'GeneratedDllImportAttribute.CharSet' or 'MarshalAsAttribute'.

data.name: NativeGenericTypeMustBeClosedDescription
data.value: The native type '{0}' must be a closed generic so the emitted code can use a specific instantiation.

data.name: NativeGenericTypeMustBeClosedMessage
data.value: The native type '{0}' for managed type '{1}' must be a closed generic type.

data.name: NativeTypeMustBeBlittableDescription
data.value: A native type for a given type must be blittable.

data.name: NativeTypeMustBeBlittableMessage
data.value: The native type '{0}' for the type '{1}' is not blittable

data.name: NativeTypeMustBeNonNullDescription
data.value: A native type for a given type must be non-null.

data.name: NativeTypeMustBeNonNullMessage
data.value: The native type for the type '{0}' is null

data.name: NativeTypeMustBePointerSizedDescription
data.value: The native type must be pointer sized so the pinned result of 'GetPinnableReference' can be cast to the native type.

data.name: NativeTypeMustBePointerSizedMessage
data.value: The native type '{0}' must be pointer sized because the managed type '{1}' has a 'GetPinnableReference' method

data.name: NativeTypeMustHaveRequiredShapeDescription
data.value: The native type must have at least one of the two marshalling methods to enable marshalling the managed type.

data.name: NativeTypeMustHaveRequiredShapeMessage
data.value: The native type '{0}' must be a value type and have a constructor that takes one parameter of type '{1}' or a parameterless instance method named 'ToManaged' that returns '{1}'

data.name: OutByValueNotSupportedDescription
data.value: The '[Out]' attribute is only supported on array parameters.

data.name: OutByValueNotSupportedMessage
data.value: The '[Out]' attribute is not supported on the '{0}' parameter.

data.name: RefValuePropertyUnsupportedDescription
data.value: The 'Value' property must not be a 'ref' or 'readonly ref' property.

data.name: RefValuePropertyUnsupportedMessage
data.value: The 'Value' property on the native type '{0}' must not be a 'ref' or 'readonly ref' property.

data.name: StackallocConstructorMustHaveStackBufferSizeConstantDescription
data.value: When constructor taking a Span<byte> is specified on the native type, the type must also have a public integer constant named StackBufferSize to provide the size of the stack-allocated buffer.

data.name: StackallocConstructorMustHaveStackBufferSizeConstantMessage
data.value: The native type '{0}' must have a 'public const int StackBufferSize' field that specifies the size of the stack buffer because it has a constructor that takes a stack-allocated Span<byte>

data.name: StackallocMarshallingShouldSupportAllocatingMarshallingFallbackDescription
data.value: A type that supports marshalling from managed to native by stack allocation should also support marshalling from managed to native where stack allocation is impossible.

data.name: StackallocMarshallingShouldSupportAllocatingMarshallingFallbackMessage
data.value: Native type '{0}' has a stack-allocating constructor does not support marshalling in scenarios where stack allocation is impossible

data.name: TargetFrameworkNotSupportedDescription
data.value: P/Invoke source generation is only supported on .NET {0} or above. The generated source will not be compatible with other frameworks.

data.name: TargetFrameworkNotSupportedMessage
data.value: 'GeneratedDllImportAttribute' cannot be used for source-generated P/Invokes on the current target framework. Source-generated P/Invokes require .NET {0} or above.

data.name: TargetFrameworkNotSupportedTitle
data.value: Current target framework is not supported by source-generated P/Invokes

data.name: TypeNotSupportedDescription
data.value: For types that are not supported by source-generated P/Invokes, the resulting P/Invoke will rely on the underlying runtime to marshal the specified type.

data.name: TypeNotSupportedMessageParameter
data.value: The type '{0}' is not supported by source-generated P/Invokes. The generated source will not handle marshalling of parameter '{1}'.

data.name: TypeNotSupportedMessageParameterWithDetails
data.value: {0} The generated source will not handle marshalling of parameter '{1}'.
data.comment: {0} is a message containing additional details about what is not supported {1} is the name of the parameter

data.name: TypeNotSupportedMessageReturn
data.value: The type '{0}' is not supported by source-generated P/Invokes. The generated source will not handle marshalling of the return value of method '{1}'.

data.name: TypeNotSupportedMessageReturnWithDetails
data.value: {0} The generated source will not handle marshalling of the return value of method '{1}'.
data.comment: {0} is a message containing additional details about what is not supported {1} is the name of the method

data.name: TypeNotSupportedTitle
data.value: Specified type is not supported by source-generated P/Invokes

data.name: ValuePropertyMarshallingRequiresAdditionalState
data.value: Marshalling a value between managed and native with a native type with a 'Value' property requires extra state, which is not supported in this context.

data.name: ValuePropertyMustHaveGetterDescription
data.value: The native type's 'Value' property must have a getter to support marshalling from managed to native.

data.name: ValuePropertyMustHaveGetterMessage
data.value: The 'Value' property on the native type '{0}' must have a getter

data.name: ValuePropertyMustHaveSetterDescription
data.value: The native type's 'Value' property must have a setter to support marshalling from native to managed.

data.name: ValuePropertyMustHaveSetterMessage
data.value: The 'Value' property on the native type '{0}' must have a setter
